lcIntro.p: The print attribute is no longer available. in DITA 2.0. The attribute is used in <topicref> elements and was deprecated in DITA 1.3.

lcInstruction.p: The print attribute indicated whether the referenced topic should be printed, with the values “yes,” “no,” and “printonly.” The value “printonly” indicated that the topic would be included only when used for printed output (as opposed to web output).

The replacement for print is the deliveryTarget filtering attribute. This attribute has the advantage that it can be used in either topics or maps. Additionally, because deliveryTarget is a filtering attribute, the values used are entirely up to your organization.
